description: MRU Calibration and Verification by Inter-System Comparison. Supports Pitch and Roll sensor calibration with 3-sigma outlier rejection, statistical analysis, and professional PDF reporting.

certificateStatement: This is to certify that Motion Reference Unit (MRU) Pitch and Roll sensor calibration has been successfully completed using 3-sigma statistical analysis in accordance with industry standard procedures.
